findings.title: Emerging Trend Signal
findings.author: @milesdeutscher
findings.whatItIs: Topic gaining traction or going viral
findings.howItWorks: Network effects driving attention to a specific topic or tool
findings.opinion: Trends create temporary attention windows. Move fast or skip.
findings.opportunity: Create content, tools, or services riding the trend

findings.title: AI Tool/Agent Innovation
findings.author: @Web3Aible
findings.whatItIs: New AI-powered tool or agent capability
findings.howItWorks: Uses LLMs or AI agents to automate or enhance workflows
findings.opinion: AI tools are hot but crowded. Differentiation is key.
findings.opportunity: Niche down, integrate with existing workflows, or build wrappers
findings.difficulty: Low-Medium - many AI tools are wrappers around APIs
